mapper.select: select count(1) from jt_808_request_trace_log req left join jt_808_response_trace_log res on req.request_id = res.request_id

select req.request_id as requestId, req.terminal_id as terminalId, req.net_type as netType, req.message_id as messageId, req.version as version, req.flow_id as flowId, req.message_body_length as messageBodyLength, req.message_body_property as messageBodyProperty, req.received_at as receivedAt, res.sent_at as sentAt, req.is_subpackage as isSubpackage, req.current_package_no as currentPackageNo, req.total_package as totalPackage, req.raw_hex as requestHex, req.escaped_hex as requestHexEscaped, req.trace_id as traceId, res.escaped_hex as responseHex from jt_808_request_trace_log req left join jt_808_response_trace_log res on req.request_id = res.request_id order by req.received_at desc, current_package_no limit #{dto.pageSize} offset #{dto.offset}
